clearcontrol.microscope.adaptive.modules

Class AdaptationModuleBase<S extends AcquisitionStateInterface<?,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.device.name.NameableBase
      • clearcontrol.microscope.adaptive.modules.AdaptationModuleBase<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - state type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsynchronousExecutorFeature, NameableInterface, ReadOnlyNameableInterface, LoggingFeature, AdaptationModuleInterface<S>, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Boolean>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NDIteratorAdaptationModule

    public abstract class AdaptationModuleBase<S extends AcquisitionStateInterface<?,?>>
extends NameableBase
implements AdaptationModuleInterface<S>, LoggingFeature
    Base class providing common fields and methods for all adaptation modules

    royer
